title: What Champions Should I Buy
body:
I am not sure what champion i should buy , im trying to get better at all roles at the moment so here are my options 

Rek Sai, Jinx , Syndra , Zac , Gnar , Braum , Nami

replies.body:
{{champion:222}}  :D
Ofc great if you love ADC or even if your getting into it. She isn't that hard, and fun as hell.
You can even snowball off a losing lane using super mega death rocket :D

Seriously sniping with that rocket feels so fiine.

Would be really helpful if you listed some champions that you really like playing if you want better suggestions :p
Maybe you should just wait for free champs rotation and play each and everyone of them at least once and see if you like playing the champion or not. Buy anything that you enjoy and love playing.
I play zac{{champion:154}} , vel'koz {{champion:161}} and Garen{{champion:86}}. Zac is good to CC. Garen is kinda fun with his buffs and velkoz is a glass cannon. Try these 3.
